changeSet.author: jamshid
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS DecathlonEvents ( id BIGINT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, eventType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, sport VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, coefficientA NUMERIC(10, 6) NOT NULL, coefficientB NUMERIC(10, 6) NOT NULL, coefficientC NUMERIC(10, 6) NOT NULL ); INSERT INTO DecathlonEvents (eventType, sport, coefficientA, coefficientB, coefficientC) VALUES ('FIELD', 'LONG_JUMP', 0.14354, 220, 1.4), ('FIELD', 'HIGH_JUMP', 0.8465, 75, 1.42), ('FIELD', 'DISCUS_THROW', 12.91, 4, 1.1), ('FIELD', 'POLE_VAULT', 0.2797, 100, 1.35), ('FIELD', 'JAVELIN_THROW', 10.14, 7, 1.08), ('TRACK', 'ONE_HUNDRED_METER', 25.4347, 18, 1.81), ('TRACK', 'FOUR_HUNDRED_METER', 5.74352, 28.5, 1.92);
